page.title: 15LANGUAGE
page.content: In our area we talk with a Yorkshire accent. Here are some examples WEERS THA BIN - where have you been. AH TOLD THI SO means I told you so THA KNOWS NOWT means you now nothing THA FLUMMOXED LAD - you're mixed up CUSH PET used to calm a cow down DOWN YONDER - means over there. YOU BERK - you are an idiot. OWT - anything. SUMMAT - something. I'M RIGHT THRONG - extremely busy. PUT T'WOOD IN'T OIL- shut the door. DOES THA SEEST - do you understand. STOP BRODDLING YER NOSE - stop picking your nose. I'M MIDERED TO DEATH - very worried. NAY LAD - an expression of disbelief. GI' O'ER - give over (stop what you are doing).
